portfolio.title: Email Client
portfolio.desc:
Group project creating an Email Client Service using React, JavaScript, HTML and Vite.

In this project we worked together to build a front-end using React, to match a supplied design with a pre-exisiting API back-end. The site has a pages for the inbox, sent and deleted emails, as well as the ability to create, delete and search for emails.

portfolio.title: Project Management System
portfolio.desc:
Group project creating a Project Management System using PHP and HTML.

In this project we were given the pre-built front-end and tasked with building the back-end using Object Oreiented Programming in PHP. Within each project, we filtered the tasks to each user and added individual deadlines, which would turn red if overdue.

portfolio.title: Hotel Booking API
portfolio.desc:
This was our final group project to create an API back-end for a Hotel Booking System.

Within this project, the front-end was supplied using React and we used Laravel and PHP to build the API. We created the rooms, bookings and types using seeders with a MYSQL database. Then we added the ability to book a room, filter bookings by room, and working out the average length of stay per room.
